titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the honourable judges of assize, at the cathedral in Lincoln, July 21. 1673 Sir William Humble Baronet, being high sheriff of the county. By Richard Hollingworth, minister of God's Word at West-ham near London.
titleStmt.author: Hollingworth, Richard, 1639?-1701.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the honourable judges of assize, at the cathedral in Lincoln, July 21. 1673 Sir William Humble Baronet, being high sheriff of the county. By Richard Hollingworth, minister of God's Word at West-ham near London.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Boulter, at the Turks-Head in Cornhil, over against the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached before the judges.
Identified at reel 1124:27 as Wing H2497 (number cancelled).
Reproductions of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
